files.patch:
@@ -252,2 +252,0 @@
-  // Parallel GC claims with a release - so other threads might access this object
-  // after claiming and they should see the "completed" object.
@@ -272,0 +270,2 @@
+    ContinuationGCSupport::transform_stack_chunk(new_obj);
+
@@ -283,2 +283,0 @@
-      ContinuationGCSupport::transform_stack_chunk(new_obj);
